price: 55. fuera de Al-lah. Conspiren todos contra mí y actúen sin más demora.
arabic: مِن دُونِهِۦۖ فَكِيدُونِي جَمِيعٗا ثُمَّ لَا تُنظِرُونِ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: min dūnihi fakīdūnī jamīʿan thumma lā tunẓirūni
